original_text:
Why are we sitting here?
    Gather together!
Let us flee to the fortified cities
    and perish there!
For the Lord our God has doomed us to perish
    and given us poisoned water to drink,
    because we have sinned against him.
korean_text: 우리가 어찌 가만히 앉았으랴 모일지어다 우리가 견고한 성읍들로 들어가서 거기에서 멸망하자 우리가 여호와께 범죄하였으므로 우리 하나님 여호와께서 우리를 멸하시며 우리에게 독한 물을 마시게 하심이니라

sentences.original_text: Let us flee to the fortified cities
For the Lord our God has doomed us to perish
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 우리 주 하나님이 우리를 멸망시키기로 작정하셨고

sentences.original_text: and given us poisoned water to drink,
because we have sinned against him.
